documentation.xlink:title: Root of data directory with READMEs

dataset.name: Extended Ephemeris Information for TSX-5/CEASE
dataset.label: Ephemeris information for the CEASE spacecraft, including CEASE look direction, magnetic field, S/C position, and S/C velocity.

variable.name: Pitch Angle
variable.label: Pitch Angle

variable.name: C_V_X
variable.label: X component with resepct to the CEASE instrument look direction vector (normalized ECI coord system)

variable.name: C_V_Y
variable.label: Y component with resepct to the CEASE instrument look direction vector (normalized ECI coord system)

variable.name: C_V_Z
variable.label: Z component with resepct to the CEASE instrument look direction vector (normalized ECI coord system)

variable.name: BX
variable.label: X component of magnetic field (ECI coord system)

variable.name: BY
variable.label: Y component of magnetic field (ECI coord system)

variable.name: BZ
variable.label: Z component of magnetic field (ECI coord system)

variable.name: X
variable.label: X component of the ECI satellite position

variable.name: Y
variable.label: Y component of the ECI satellite position

variable.name: Z
variable.label: Z component of the ECI satellite position

variable.name: VX
variable.label: X component of the ECI satellite velocity

variable.name: VY
variable.label: Y component of the ECI satellite velocity

variable.name: VZ
variable.label: Z component of the ECI satellite velocity

variable.name: Longitude
variable.label: Longitude (0-360)

variable.name: Magnetic Local Time
variable.label: Magnetic Local Time (0-24)

variable.name: Radius
variable.label: Radius

variable.name: DD1LF
variable.label: DOSIMETER DD2LF

variable.name: DD2LF
variable.label: DOSIMETER DD2LF

variable.name: DD1HFA
variable.label: DOSIMETER DD1HFA

variable.name: DD2HFA
variable.label: DOSIMETER DD2HFA

variable.name: DD2HFB
variable.label: DOSIMETER DD1HFB

variable.name: DD2HFB
variable.label: DOSIMETER DD2HFB

variable.name: Proton event (based on GOES data)
variable.label: Proton event (based on GOES data) (1= yes, 0=no)
